official_title: To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to enhance the availability of investment capital for low- and moderate-income housing in low- and moderate-income neighborhoods.

summary.text: Community Reinvestment Improvement Act of 1994 - Amends the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to permit lenders to participate in affordable housing programs to Federal or State targeted low- and moderate-income neighborhoods (which may be outside of their lending areas).

titles.title: To amend the Community Reinvestment Act of 1977 to enhance the availability of investment capital for low- and moderate-income housing in low- and moderate-income neighborhoods.
